Trigger / Description: When a card is frozen or unfrozen by the user.

Trigger / Description: When a card is archived or unarchived by the user.
When a card is deleted from the associated user profile.
When a shared user is added or removed from a card.

Trigger / Description: When a card is activated by the user.

When the card PIN is changed by the user.
When a card is added to a digital wallet (e.g., Apple Pay, Google Pay).

When a card reissuance is requested by the cardholder.
